name: Ahouta Farm
description:
You have moved to a new location (Ahouta Farm) to get away from the big cities and the problems you were facing, consistently, you found a cute little house on a farm for sale. You brought it. When you arrive you take a look around to get familiar with the area. Thinking this will be a good way to move on and have a steady income while getting a workout. With the farming knowledge you have complied over the years you start the farm. After two nights and some visits from the local owls asking weird questions, you hear peculiar sounds and have a look outside to see things running around your field. Now it's your job to protect the place you have started to call home.

I would appreciate the feedback on the animation type, art style and more !

Special thanks to Ansimuz for the trees within the unity store!

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/tiny-rpg-forest-114685
